venue.address_2: Across the street from Roxbury CC & MBTA
venue.name: Reggie Lewis Track and Athletic Center (RLTAC) at Roxbury Community College

item.description:
16th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival

10:00 AM - 11:00 AM (PREVIEW HOUR - $5 prepaid at www.bostonveg.org/foodfest  <
11:00 AM - 6:00 PM  Oct 29, 2011 - FREE
10:00 AM - 4:00 PM  Oct 30, 2011 - FREE
Save the dates!  

Sunday the hours are 10 am to 4 pm (ends earlier Sunday afternoon than on Saturday)

The 16th Annual Boston Vegetarian Food Festival will be back at the Reggie Lewis Athletic Center with a fabulous lineup of national speakers and chefs, tasty free food sampling, and over 100 exhibitors, all illustrating how plant-based living is fun and easy as well as enjoyable and very rewarding.  

You won't want to miss it! FREE FOOD !  BRING THE CHILDREN to WALK AROUND and EAT (or to enjoy the International Children's Center.  Asian groups will ALSO be there!



www.bostonveg.org/foodfest
